headline: LUFRAN TEFLON PROCESS TANK HEATER
description: Teflon Process Tank Heater    Compatible with sulphuric, nitric or acetic acids, various strippers even KOH and HF.
specstable:
Manufacturer Lufran
Model SB SERIES
Description Teflon Process Tank Heater
Other Information

System components:

  • Controller(heater/purge)
  • Back pressure module
  • Level sensor
  • Tank heater element w/6 ft. cable
    Temperature range: 0-180°C
    Overtemperature protection
    Type J thermocouple
    Watlow controller(digital readout)
    Heater: 1 kW(9" x 7")
    N2 Purge
Power Requirements 120 V 11.0 A 50/60 Hz 1 Phase
Condition Very Good
Weight 30 lb (14 kg)
